Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As token infrastructure developer (committing peer) I am able to process transactions with expectation corresponding to TransferFrom requests
Issue.description: Committing peer logic needs to be enhanced to be able to process combined transactions (i.e., transactions containing an endorsed and token action) with a token action corresponding to a TransferFrom action. Notice that components of FAB-11965 need to be extended.
